title: March 21st - Basic Bitch Quickie (BBQ) Weekly Roundup
itunes:title: March 21st - Basic Bitch Quickie (BBQ) Weekly Roundup
itunes:subtitle: Kardashian Family update, Bachelor Finale + Franchise Update, and Bella Hadid regretting her nose job
description:
This week we're talking through a wide range of topics, from our usual Kardashian family weekly update (the Pete Davidson versus Kayne saga continues) to a Bachelor Franchise update. See below for the topics of the week:


Bella Hadid

  • Social media is super unhappy with Yolanda Hadid after finding out Bella got a nose job at 14


Bachelor Franchise Updates

  • Susie and Clayton are together 
  • Abc announces 2 women leads for the next season of the bachelorette 


Kardashian Family Update

  • Ye and Pete texts leaked
  • Kanye West pulled from the Grammys performance lineup due to his concerning online behavior
  • Kanye banned from IG for 24 hours 
  • Pete has branded Kim’s name on his chest and has “3” tats already
  • Kardashian Trailer - Kourtney and Travis trying for baby




Don't forget to follow us, review our podcast and subscribe on our socials!

  • Twitter: @BasicandBrain
  • Instagram: @TheBasicandTheBrain
  • TikTok: @thebasic_and_thebrain
  • Website: thebasicandthebrain.com



Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
